I think this is not a JFace-Problem but one from the SVN-Plugin. It seems that they are passing a disposed-Font. A better Exception message from SWT would help here because then you would have noticed this earlier. Please file a bug in the polarion bugtracker.
Trying to move this one to the Subversive product...
Dunno how to reassign this bug, I sent a mail to subversive-user asking the Polarion people to have a look at this bug...
Fix will be available in the Subversive version 1.1.3
